item.description:
TOPIC: The Ideal Life -getting rid of Limiting Beliefs

This month we will explore what ti takes to get that ideal life.  Most of us have limiting beliefs that get in the way of us getting what we want.  We will look at getting rid of those limiting beliefs as well as some positive guided imagery.

Techniques in both NLP and Hypnosis will be used.

 

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be. 

Kevin Martin

978-273-5905

kenda_assoc@msn.com

www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Methuen - The Ideal Life
